tasks.label: Push to GitHub
args: cd 'c:\Users\LATITUDE 5400\Downloads\Learnership Management'; git -c 'core.sshCommand=ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no' push origin main; echo 'Push completed'; exit 0

tasks.label: Push to GitHub SSH
tasks.command: powershell -NoProfile -Command Set-Location 'c:\Users\LATITUDE 5400\Downloads\Learnership Management'; & { git push origin main }
